div.p: Projected change in air temperature for Europe: 2070–2100. The mean difference between scenario (2071–2100) and control (1961–1990) outputs for air temperature (°C) across Europe in winter (DJF) and spring (MAM) for the ECHAM4/OPYC3-RCAO A2 (E A2) ( a and b) and HadAM3H-RCAO B2 (H B2) ( c and d) scenarios.
